name: Vel'Koz
title: the Eye of the Void
lore: It is unclear if Vel'Koz was the first Void-spawn to emerge on Runeterra, but there has certainly never been another to match his level of cruel, calculating sentience. While his kin devour or defile everything around them, he seeks instead to scrutinize and study the physical realm—and the strange, warlike beings that dwell there—for any weakness the Void might exploit. But Vel'Koz is far from a passive observer, striking back at threats with deadly plasma, or by disrupting the very fabric of the world itself.
blurb: It is unclear if Vel'Koz was the first Void-spawn to emerge on Runeterra, but there has certainly never been another to match his level of cruel, calculating sentience. While his kin devour or defile everything around them, he seeks instead to...
allytips: When laning, use Void Rift to kill minions while building stacks of Organic Deconstruction on your opponent. You can then follow up with your other abilities.
Shooting Plasma Fission diagonally and splitting at maximum range allows you to hit opponents that are out of the range of the initial missile, but is more challenging to pull off.
Be very careful about when to use Life Form Disintegration Ray. Many champions have abilities that can interrupt the spell.
enemytips: Vel'Koz is very dangerous if left alone in a fight. Try to focus him down early.
Vel'Koz has fairly low mobility and is vulnerable to ganks.
Life Form Disintegration Ray can be interrupted by stuns, silences and knockups.

riot_spells.name: Plasma Fission
riot_spells.description: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Vel'Koz shoots a plasma bolt that deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and slows enemies by {{ slowamount*100 }}% decaying over {{ slowduration }} second(s).

Upon reactivation or upon hitting an enemy, the bolt splits at a 90 degree angle.

Killing a unit with this refunds {{ manarefund*100 }}% of the Mana Cost.

riot_spells.name: Void Rift
riot_spells.description: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage. After a delay, it deals an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage.

Void Rift has a 2 second cooldown between casts.

riot_spells.name: Tectonic Disruption
riot_spells.description: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Vel'Koz disrupts a nearby area which, after a delay, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and knocks up enemies hit for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Any enemies hit that are close to Vel'Koz will be pushed slightly in the direction the ability was cast.

riot_spells.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
riot_spells.description: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Passive: Deconstructing enemy Champions Researches them for {{ e2 }} seconds. Basic attacks and all abilities refresh Research.

Active: Vel'Koz channels a ray of energy that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds, dealing Magic Damage up to a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and slowing units hit by {{ e3 }}%.

Enemies that stay in the beam will periodically gain Organic Deconstruction stacks. Deals True Damage instead of Magic against Researched units.

riot_passive.name: Organic Deconstruction
riot_passive.description: Vel'Koz's abilities apply <keywordName>Organic Deconstruction</keywordName> to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.

i1.name: Organic Deconstruction
i1.blurb: Vel'Koz's abilities apply Organic Deconstruction to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.
i1.description2: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Vel'Koz's''' [[Champion ability|abilities]] apply a ''Deconstruction'' stack for 7 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. Basic attacks refresh the duration on-hit.
i1.description3: The third stack consumes them all to deal {{pp|33 to 169}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}} {{tip|true damage|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}}.

q1.name: Plasma Fission
q1.blurb: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vel'Koz''' fires an energy bolt that collides with the first enemy hit to deal {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} and {{tip|slow|slow}} by 70% for a few seconds, decaying over the duration.
q1.description2: At the end of its range, upon re-activation after {{fd|0.25}} seconds, or upon colliding with an enemy, the bolt splits in half, each part firing in opposite directions perpendicular to the primary bolt's trajectory.
q1.leveling3: {{st|Mana Restored On-Kill|{{as|{{ap|20 to 30}}|mana}}|Maximum Mana Restored|{{as|{{ap|20*3 to 30*3}}|mana}}}}
q1.notes:
* An enemy cannot be hit by multiple bolts even when having blocked one with a spell shield.
* ''Plasma Fission'' can travel a maximum ~1521 units diagonally.

w1.name: Void Rift
w1.blurb: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.
w1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Vel'Koz''' periodically [[stock]]s a ''Void Rift'' charge, up to a maximum of 2.
w1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vel'Koz''' opens a rift to the void that cuts through the ground in a line, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and leaving behind a trail. After a {{fd|0.25}} seconds delay, the trail detonates, dealing {{as|magic damage}}.
w1.leveling2:
{{st|Initial Magic Damage|{{ap|30 to 110}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Detonation Magic Damage|{{ap|45 to 165}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|30+45 to 110+165}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
* '''Vel'Koz''' can cast ''Void Rift'' while moving but not while attacking.
* {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} and {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} will block the rift from forming over them, but they will not destroy the trail that was created before it.
* ''Void Rift'' must finish before another can be cast.

e1.name: Tectonic Disruption
e1.blurb: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vel'Koz''' hurls a disruptive anomaly that reaches the target location after {{fd|0.55}} seconds, briefly providing {{tip|sight}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|suspension|suspending}} enemies in the area for {{fd|0.75}} seconds. If the area is created close to '''Vel'Koz''', enemies hit are also slightly {{tip|airborne|knocked back}} in the direction of the cast.
e1.notes:
* ''Tectonic Disruption's'' suspension is affected by {{ii|Mercury's Treads|Tenacity}}.
* The required proximity for displacement is relative to '''Vel'Koz's''' position when casting and not his current one.
* There is a brief ~{{fd|0.1}} second cast time before the projectile begins to travel.
* Although considered to be a projectile, {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} and {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} will block ''Tectonic Disruption'', but will not destroy it.

r1.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
r1.blurb: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.
r1.description: {{sbc|Passive - Researched:}} {{ai|Organic Deconstruction|Vel'Koz|Deconstructing}} enemy champions marks them as ''{{ai|Researched|Vel'Koz}}'' for 7 seconds. Basic attacks and ability damage refresh the duration on-hit.
r1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vel'Koz''' {{ct|channels}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds to project an energy beam in a line. The ray's trajectory updates itself over the duration to face the target direction. Reactivating ''Life Form Disintegration Ray'' ends the channel.
r1.description3: The ray deals {{as|magic damage}} in {{fd|0.25}} seconds intervals, and {{tip|slow|slows}} by 20% for 1 second. {{ai|Organic Deconstruction|Vel'Koz|Deconstruction}} is applied every {{fd|0.7}} seconds to enemies hit. {{ai|Researched|Vel'Koz|''Researched''}} enemies take {{as|true damage}} instead.
r1.leveling3: {{st|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|45 to 80}} {{as|(+ {{fd|12.5}}% AP)}}|Maximum Magic Damage|{{ap|45*10 to 80*10}} {{as|(+ 125% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* ''Life Form Disintegration Ray's'' trajectory updates gradually (moving the cursor from one side of '''Vel'Koz''' to the other will not make him rotate instantly).
* The beam covers '''Vel'Koz's '''hitbox, damaging enemies standing close.
